title: Almighty - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Alchemy   Arrogant Characters   Beast Companions   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Broken Engagement   Cultivation   First-time Interc**rse   Genius Protagonist   Level System   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Family Background   Pill Concocting   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: One Leaf In The Sky   一叶青天
description: Yang Tian’s clan is slaughtered overnight without any prior omens or any reason he can comprehend. Strangely, their ally clan, Li Clan, doesn’t send them any help. His parents hide him in a dimension during the attack to save his life, although the pressure inside the dimension damages him due to him not being ready for it. When he recovers eight years later, he begins his search for the culprits to avenge his fallen clan.>
